hints: You can see all six directions in the room. Use arrowkeys to change your facing direction.
Every item is one-time use only. Every passcode or combination is one-time use only as well.
Related clues always have something in common. Style or appearance.
The solution to the puzzle is very obvious sometimes. Examine the environment carefully.
You might forget to look up or down. Arrow up and down are also available to you.
There's no hint telling you what to do exactly. Alway expect a spoiler-free hint.
